channel.title: How do i make a ::players command with a list interface?
channel.description: how do you make a command to have an interface. like the quest interface but with a list of players online with their levels and such?

item.title: How do i make a ::players command with a list interface?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Loop it through playerHandler to begin with.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a ::players command with a list interface?
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

drubrkletern:

Make it so it checks the characters online and places each of them on a new line in the interface.

i dont know how to do that. thats the problem. there is nothing at all in my clinet forme to base it off of

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a ::players command with a list interface?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You can base it from this old stafflist command

[code]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“stafflist”)) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(" “, 13610);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13611);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13612);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13613);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13614);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13615);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13616);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13617);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13618);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13619);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13620);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13621);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13622);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(” “, 13623);
c.getPA().showInterface(13585);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(”@blu@Final Judgement’s Official Staff List:", 13589);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Main Owners- Pain, Love”, 13591);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Head- Administrator- James “, 13592);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Administrators- “, 13593);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Head- Moderator- Lol Pwned M8”, 13594);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Moderators- Birdloveman,Theman1077,Slayer,X”, 13595);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Server Helpers-”, 13596);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Donators- “, 13597);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Server Coders-”, 13598);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“PM any of these people above if you need help!”, 13599);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(”( Unless they are busy )”, 13600);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(””, 13601);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(””, 13602);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13602);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13603);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13604);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13605);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13606);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13607);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13608);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 13609);

		}[/code]
